thread.title: Facebook Search now looks at all public posts: Here’s how it affects your privacy

title: Facebook Search now looks at all public posts: Here’s how it affects your privacy
text:
Facebook Search now looks at all public posts: Here’s how it affects your privacy 
Published By: Pocket-lint.com - Today 
Facebook overhauled its search bar last year so that it could be used to find not only your friends but also what your friends were saying. ...
